restore_power_mode: cmd power set-fixed-performance-mode-enabled false && cmd power set-adaptive-power-saver-enabled true
restore_fps_unlocker: settings delete system peak_refresh_rate && settings delete system min_refresh_rate && settings delete secure user_refresh_rate && settings delete system miui_refresh_rate
restore_animation_speed: settings put global window_animation_scale 1.0 && settings put global transition_animation_scale 1.0 && settings put global animator_duration_scale 1.0
restore_gpu_rendering: setprop debug.hwui.force_hw_ui false && settings delete global disable_hw_overlays
restore_angle_for_app: settings delete global angle_gl_driver_selection_pkgs && settings delete global angle_gl_driver_selection_values
